nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_420
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Everything considered, this city is the world's most exciting city.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_421
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Though with no approval from his parents, he went ahead with his plan to study abroad.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_422
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The bridge was named after the hero who gave his life for the cause of people.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_423
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It is said that the painter used his mother as the model in the painting whose face represented suffering yet strength.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_424
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The writer instantly rose to fame in 1950 with the publication of a novel inspired by his experience with a girl on a farm.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_425
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: One story says that "US" was short for "Uncle Sam" whose real name was Sam Wilson, who had once worked with a man who had signed a contract with the government to provide meat to the US Army.
